Package org.hl7.fhir.r4.terminologies

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ITerminologyServices
    The value set system has a collection of value sets that define code systems, and construct value sets from them Large external terminologies - LOINC, Snomed, etc - are too big, and trying to represent their definition as a native value set is too large.
    TerminologyClient  
    ValueSetChecker  
    ValueSetExpander  
    ValueSetExpanderFactory

    Class Description
    CodeSystemUtilities  
    ImplicitValueSets  
    ITerminologyServices.ValidationResult  
    LoincToDEConvertor
    This class converts the LOINC XML representation that the FHIR build tool uses internally to a set of DataElements in an atom feed
    TerminologyClientR4  
    TerminologyServiceCache  
    ValueSetCheckerSimple  
    ValueSetExpander.ValueSetExpansionOutcome
    Some value sets are just too big to expand.
